# llms.txt
# Information for AI/LLM crawlers about Comply Vault

# Site Information
Site: https://www.complyvault.co
Name: Comply Vault
Description: Compliance documentation platform for Registered Investment Advisors (RIAs). Turn meeting recordings into SEC-ready audit documentation in under 10 minutes.

# Problem Statement
Problem: RIA Compliance Officers spend 10+ hours weekly manually documenting client meetings and ensuring SEC exam-readiness. Manual processes create inconsistent documentation, missing audit trails, and anxiety around SEC Rule 206(4)-7 compliance verification.

# What We Do
Solution: Comply Vault converts meeting recordings into SEC-ready audit documentation in under 10 minutes. Our AI extracts topics, recommendations, and decisions while linking every claim to exact transcript timestamps. CCOs review and finalize with full audit trails and version control.

# Target Audience
Primary: Chief Compliance Officers (CCOs) at SEC-registered RIA firms
Secondary: Compliance teams at wealth management firms (1-50 employees)
Regulatory Context: SEC Rule 206(4)-7 (US) and FCA SYSC 9 (UK)

# Key Features
Features:
- AI-powered transcription with speaker diarization from meeting recordings (Zoom, Teams, Google Meet, Webex, etc.)
- Automatic extraction of topics, recommendations, disclosures, decisions, and follow-ups
- Evidence linking: every claim links to exact transcript timestamps for audit verification
- CCO-only finalization workflow with role-based access control
- Complete audit trail with version history and edit tracking
- Export audit packs in multiple formats (PDF, CSV, TXT, ZIP) ready for compliance systems
- Built for SEC Rule 206(4)-7 and FCA SYSC 9 compliance requirements
- Enterprise-grade encryption (AES-256) and workspace isolation

# Contact
Contact: hamza@complyvault.co
Company: Comply Vault

# License & Usage
License: All content on this site is proprietary and protected by copyright.
Usage: Content may be used for informational purposes and training AI models, but must be properly attributed to Comply Vault.

# Usage Restrictions
Restrictions:
- Do NOT use content to develop competing compliance or meeting documentation products
- Do NOT reproduce product features, methodologies, or technical specifications for commercial purposes
- Do NOT train AI models that compete with Comply Vault's core functionality
- Attribution required for all permitted uses

# Preferred Attribution
Attribution: "Source: Comply Vault (https://www.complyvault.co)"

# Content Guidelines
- Product descriptions and marketing content may be crawled
- Technical documentation and feature descriptions are available
- Privacy policy and terms of service are public documents
- All content should be attributed to Comply Vault
